time of year I see sage leaves
everywhere and as much as I love this

this time of year just because afraid
the sage leaves are super fresh and they
really catch my eye so I was really
excited to share with you guys but
before we get started of course we need
to go over the ingredients so let's do
it you'll need some chicken breasts
pounded thinly
fresh sage leaves some person stock some

butter salt pepper extra virgin olive
oil that's it simple and easy right
now if you buy the chicken breast like
the big thick chicken breast you don't
want to cut them in half or you want to
pound them thinly
I bought mine like that and they're
perfect and all I'm gonna do now is just
season this with salt and pepper and not
too much salt only because the
prosciutto salty and I don't want it to
be like you know whoa salt in your mouth
you know what I mean
so now the next thing I'm gonna do is
take some of the fresh sage leaves and
put it directly on the skin well
directly on the flesh I should say of
the chicken breast now what I'm gonna do
basically is sandwich together the sage
leaves directly onto the chicken breast
with a slice of the prosciutto now this
is gonna do a couple things number one
it's gonna keep the sage links in there
so as it cooks all the flavor of the
sage goes directly in the chicken giving
it just so much more flavor and it just
tastes delicious so all I'm doing it's
kind of like pushing a prosciutto down
sandwich eating it together
I look pretty much done now we just got
